ListProperties(self, pattern=None, type=None, **kwargs)

source code 

Returns a list of property names from the PropertyList with optional filters

Parameters:
  • pattern - list properties with specific names with optional wildcard *. Default is all.
  • type - get properties of specific types. See self.kPropertyTypes.keys() for names

    Optional parameters True/False for testing from FBProperty: IsAnimatable IsInternal IsList IsMaxClamp IsMinClamp IsObjectList IsReadOnly IsReferenceProperty IsUserProperty

Adds a namespace to the object

Parameters:

  • toRight - Add namespace to the right of other namespaces. Default False (left)
